statusLine.command: input=$(cat); session_file="/tmp/claude_session_$(id -u).txt"; if [ ! -f "$session_file" ]; then date +%s > "$session_file"; fi; session_start=$(cat "$session_file"); current_time=$(date +%s); session_duration=$((current_time - session_start)); hours=$((session_duration / 3600)); minutes=$(((session_duration % 3600) / 60)); seconds=$((session_duration % 60)); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Claude"'); branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); folder=$(basename "$(pwd)"); printf "⏱️  %02d:%02d:%02d | 🤖 %s | 🌿 %s | 📁 %s" $hours $minutes $seconds "$model" "$branch" "$folder"
